TopicTitle: Special effects glitch in Vehicle Assembly Building?

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I'm not sure if anyone is receiving this particular bug/glitch. But I might as well try to explain it. There seems to be a bug with the special effects that won't shut off while in the VAB. for instance, I install a new mod, a new RCS thruster from a mod pack, or a new heat shield decoupler from a parts pack. However, when these parts come to the vehicle assembly building, they seem to have what I think is a "special effects" or "animation" glitch. For instance, the new RCS thruster that I downloaded from a mod pack won't turn off, it is just in the vehicle assembly building turned on for all eternity. Even when I try to launch a creation with those parts, the RCS thruster's special effects still doesn't seem to go away. Another example is that of a heat shield decoupler. Whenever a new heat shield is placed in a creation in the VAB, there is a "smoke animation" on the heat shield decoupler that won't disappear, and even when I try to launch something the smoke effect is still there. Has anyone ever received this glitch issue at all?

Incase it helps, he following mods that I was using when I experienced this particular glitch was from FASA and the Kerbin Shuttle Orbital System mod.
That means something broke when you installed it.
Okay. Is there a way to fix that issue?

Okay, so here is the problem. Now is there a way to mend and resolve it? Here is a wound, but how do I heal it?

Can anyone else just please give me any advise as to how to fix this issue?
Why yes, we can, but only if you follow the guideline in the READ FIRST sticky--we won't have enough information otherwise.
